original_text: But Zedekiah the son of Chenaanah went near, and smote Micaiah on the cheek, and said, Which way went the Spirit of the Lord from me to speak unto thee?
korean_text: 그나아나의 아들 시드기야가 가까이 와서 미가야의 뺨을 치며 이르되 여호와의 영이 나를 떠나 어디로 가서 네게 말씀하시더냐

sentences.original_text: But Zedekiah the son of Chenaanah went near
and smote Micaiah on the cheek
Which way went the Spirit of the Lord
from me to speak unto thee?
